TestCase.TestCaseTitle: Task Message Element with all possible Elements.
TestCase.TestCaseObjective: BSO validation. Test whether the Producer/Provider is able to create the correct MIP data for all the elements for an example Task and the Consumers are able to correctly understand (and display) it.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: The Producer creates message elements for Key Tasks with all possible Elements. The Consumers receive the data and process them.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: R/R, P/S.
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: The Producer/Provider has created a Topic including Tasks, for instance the 'Ground Picture > Fire Support' topic. The Consumers have subscribed to this topic.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: This test is considered a success if the Task and all elements are processed and interpreted correctly on all Nations' C2IS.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction:
The Producer creates the Task with name XXX_TAE_001 and fills ALL its elements.
Notices: XXX in name of the object is meant (in principle) to be replaced by the 3 letter code of the country name. Example for the name of the Task: FRA_TAE_001
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Consumers receive and process (and display) the Task and all elements that the Producer created.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: The Producer creates an update for the object by changing ALL elements.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Consumers receive and process (and display) the Task and all elements that the Producer created.
